entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 01:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
